verbose_text: POU3F2 has been shown to be responsive to MAPK pathway activation and to modulate the levels of microphthalmia associated transcription factor (MITF) so as to suppress the differentiated melanocytic phenotype and to enhance tumor metastasis.
evidence: microphthalmia-associated transcription factor (MITF) so as to suppress the differentiated melanocytic phenotype and to enhance tumor metastasis
